{"id":808918917,"question_id":44,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 8 months","timestamp":1664186613,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/808918917/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Wildcard Matching","memory":"43.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isMatch(String s, String p) {\n        \n        int i=0; int j=0;\n        int starIdx=-1, matchStart=0;\n        while(i<s.length()){\n            \n            if(j<p.length() && (s.charAt(i)==p.charAt(j)||p.charAt(j)=='?')){\n                i++;\n                j++;\n                \n            }else if(j<p.length() && p.charAt(j)=='*'){\n                starIdx = j;\n                matchStart = i;\n                j++;\n                \n            }else if(starIdx!=-1){\n                j = starIdx+1;\n                i = matchStart+1;\n                matchStart = i;\n            }else{\n                return false;\n            }\n        }\n        \n        \n        while(j<p.length() && p.charAt(j)=='*')\n            j++;\n        \n        return j==p.length();\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"wildcard-matching","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
